overview.title: Our Community
overview.description1: At Start Space, we're building a vibrant and collaborative community of startups, entrepreneurs, mentors, and business partners. Our goal is to provide a supportive environment that fosters growth for all community members.
overview.description2: We are dedicated to driving innovation and entrepreneurship in Beira, Mozambique and beyond, creating an ecosystem of purpose-driven, prosperous businesses.

benefits.title: Community Benefits
benefits.description: As a member of the Start Space community, you will have access to a wide range of resources and opportunities to propel your business forward.

uniqueApproach.title: Our Unique Approach
uniqueApproach.description: The "Arm, Wallet, Brain" approach is a comprehensive strategy adopted by Start Space to propel ideas and nurture talent in Mozambique's entrepreneurial scene.

braco.title: Arm
braco.description: We provide operational support and practical tools to help implement and execute your business strategies.

bolso.title: Wallet

cerebro.title: Brain

hero.title: Innovation With Purpose
hero.subtitle: We are an innovation hub that integrates faith and entrepreneurship, empowering leaders to build businesses that transform lives and create positive impact in God's Kingdom.

overview.title: About Start Space
paragraphs: Start Space is more than a startup accelerator; we follow the concept of Kingdom Business. Our commitment to excellence and integrity reflects our goal to operate as a business of God's Kingdom, impacting people and society around us.

We believe that innovation and entrepreneurship are essential for economic and social growth, and we are dedicated to providing the tools and resources necessary for our entrepreneurs to reach their full potential in line with God's values.
We combine the experience and knowledge of a startup accelerator with the training and empowerment of an organization like Sinapis to help entrepreneurs build ethical, long-term businesses.

Our team and network of partners and mentors are committed to helping entrepreneurs overcome challenges and transform ideas into successful businesses, guided by God's principles. We offer a wide range of services, including mentorship, training, networking, and investments, always striving for excellence and positive impact.

If you're an entrepreneur looking for support and resources for your startup, we're here to help you achieve your business goals with values rooted in God's Kingdom. Join us at Start Space and be part of a community of innovative entrepreneurs transforming the region and leaving a lasting legacy.

arm.title: Arm
arm.description: The physical base of the business: workspaces, laboratories, and comprehensive infrastructure to bring ideas to life.

pocket.title: Wallet
pocket.description: The financial base: access to funding, pitch opportunities, and networking with investors to secure resources.

brain.title: Brain
brain.description: The intellectual base: mentorship programs, workshops, and training to develop essential skills and knowledge.

timeline.title: Foundation of Start Space
timeline.description: We began with the vision of uniting entrepreneurship with Christian values, laying the groundwork for an environment where innovation meets humanity.

timeline.title: First Acceleration Batch
timeline.description: In 2021, we launched our pioneering acceleration program, transforming 20 startups with our unique methodology.

timeline.title: Official Registration and National Expansion
timeline.description: In 2022, we formalized Start Space, which enabled us to expand our operations nationwide and strengthen our impact across Mozambique.

timeline.title: Strategic Partnerships
timeline.description: In 2023, we forged strategic partnerships with local and international organizations, broadening our reach and enriching our innovation ecosystem.

timeline.title: Three Accelerated Batches
timeline.description: In 2024, we accelerated three batches in one year—a significant milestone demonstrating our methodology’s ability to scale support for entrepreneurs at various stages.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Start Space, our mission is to create sustainable and prosperous lives in Mozambique through innovative initiatives focused on human development. We believe in integrating physical resources, shared knowledge, and financial support to turn ideas into reality.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our goal is to be a catalyst for change, empowering the next generation of entrepreneurs and innovators. We strive to create an environment where creativity and technology come together to solve real challenges, shaping the future of innovation in Mozambique.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We are dedicated to transforming Mozambique's economy with innovative ideas that drive significant change.

items.title: Empowerment
items.description: Our focus is on empowering local entrepreneurs by providing the tools and support necessary to grow.

items.title: Community
items.description: We value creating a collaborative ecosystem where each individual can thrive and contribute to the growth of Mozambique’s tech and entrepreneurial sectors.

items.title: Education & Knowledge
items.description: We promote the sharing of knowledge and skills through continuous mentorship and training.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We work to create solutions that are economically, socially, and environmentally sustainable.

benefits.title: Community Benefits
benefits.description: As a member of the Start Space community, you will have access to a wide range of resources and opportunities to propel your business forward.

items.title: Networking
items.description: Join regular exclusive events where you can connect with other entrepreneurs, investors, and members of the innovation ecosystem. Our activities are designed to create meaningful and lasting connections.

items.title: Mentoring
items.description: Get access to experienced mentors across various sectors who will share valuable knowledge and practical guidance to help you overcome challenges and accelerate your business growth.

items.title: Resources
items.description: Take advantage of our complete library of tools, specialized training, and dedicated administrative support to boost your startup. We offer practical and up-to-date resources for every stage of your business.

items.title: Partnerships
items.description: Explore unique collaboration opportunities with companies and institutions in our global network. We facilitate strategic connections that can open doors to new markets and growth possibilities.
